entry.title: Tatsoi - Rainbow Tatsoi
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Seeds
Price: 3.50

Round leaves in greens and purples with white to pink stems. Larger than traditional Tatsoi. Great in salads or steamed.

What began as a unexpected cross between Tokyo Bekana and Wild Garden Seed's Pink Lettucy mild mustard has blossomed into a stunning Tastoi with purple leaves and pinkish stems.Though this population still produces some green plants, every seed selection bring this closer to the violet Tastoi of our dreams.

  • Certified organic by Ecocert Canada
  • Seeds from Canada
  • 0.2g; +/- 90 seeds per bag

entry.title: Calendula Erfurter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Seeds
Price: 3.50

Orange edible flowers. Bred for medicinal use.

Tourne-sol seeds are open-pollinated.  They will breed true to type. They were produced ecologically with organic methods. Tourne-sol does not offer GMO seeds. They were selected for our bio-region. Seeds are adapted to our climate and our weather.

  • Certified organic by Ecocert Canada
  • Seeds from Canada
  • +/- 50 seeds per bag
